classes.name: Bharatanatyam Beginners
classes.description: Learn the fundamentals of this ancient classical dance form, focusing on adavus, mudras, and basic choreography.

classes.name: Contemporary Fusion
classes.description: Explore a blend of modern movement with classical Indian techniques. Perfect for creative expression.

classes.name: Kathak Intermediate
classes.description: Refine your footwork, spins (chakkars), and storytelling (abhinaya) in this advanced course for experienced dancers.

productions.title: Upcoming Show: 'Rhythm of the Ancients'
productions.description: Join us for an unforgettable evening as our senior students and professional troupe present "Rhythm of the Ancients," a spectacular production exploring the journey of dance through time. A mesmerizing blend of light, sound, and movement awaits.

testimonials.author: Priya Sharma
testimonials.quote: Natyaswara isn't just a class, it's a family. The guidance and patience of the instructors have helped me grow not only as a dancer but as a person.

testimonials.author: Rohan Gupta
testimonials.quote: My daughter has been attending for two years, and her confidence has blossomed. The professional approach to teaching is outstanding.

testimonials.author: Anika Patel
testimonials.quote: As an adult learner, I was nervous, but the contemporary fusion class is the highlight of my week. It's challenging, fun, and so welcoming.
